Package com.pandora.config.services

Class SpecieBeanServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.pandora.config.services.SpecieBeanServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpecieBeanService
@Service public class SpecieBeanServiceImpl extends Object implements SpecieBeanService
The SpecieBeanServiceImpl service class provides methods for managing and retrieving Specie instances within the application. It uses the Spring framework's ApplicationContext for obtaining bean configurations and indexing Specie instances based on their order of appearance in the configuration. The class implements the SpecieBeanService interface to expose methods for retrieving species configurations and specific species based on their names, indices, and instances.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

  • Method Details

    • getAllSpecies

      public Map<String,Specie> getAllSpecies()
      Retrieves a map containing all species configurations. The map is keyed by species names, and the values are corresponding Specie instances. The keys are stored in lowercase for case-insensitive retrieval.
      Specified by:
      getAllSpecies in interface SpecieBeanService
      Returns:
      A map of all species configurations.

    • getSpecie

      public Specie getSpecie(String name)
      Retrieves the Specie instance corresponding to the provided species name. The retrieval is case-insensitive.
      Specified by:
      getSpecie in interface SpecieBeanService
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the species.
      Returns:
      The Specie instance for the specified species name.

    • getSpecie

      public Specie getSpecie(int i)
      Retrieves the Specie instance at the specified index within the list of indexed species.
      Specified by:
      getSpecie in interface SpecieBeanService
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the species.
      Returns:
      The Specie instance at the specified index.

    • getSpecieIndex

      public int getSpecieIndex(Specie specie)
      Retrieves the index of the provided Specie instance within the list of indexed species.
      Specified by:
      getSpecieIndex in interface SpecieBeanService
      Parameters:
      specie - The Specie instance for which to obtain the index.
      Returns:
      The index of the specified Specie instance.
